ComicInfo.Summary:
There’s a war going on in the shadows, and Robyn might just be on the wrong side. An investigation into a series of ritual murders turns from homicidal to apocalyptic as all the signs point to something very big and very bad about to befall the city of San Diego. California dreaming is about to become California screaming and Robyn may have to fight alone, as Marian has problems of her own. What kind of problems? How about a wife possessed by a being older than time? A being with a taste for human flesh!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Sergio Davila & Ceci de la Cruz | 1 | B | Cover B | Mike S Miller & Jorge Cortes | 2 | C | Cover C | Jay Anacleto & Ula Mos | 3 | D | Cover D | Caanan White & Hedwin Zaldivar | 4 | E | Wizard World Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 350 | Eric Basaldua (a) & Sanju Nivangune (c) | Missing | F | Wizard World Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 100 | Eric Basaldua (a) & Sanju Nivangune (c) | Missing | G | MegaCon Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 350 | Alé Garza (a) & Ula Mos (c) | Missing | H | MegaCon Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 75 | Alé Garza (a) & Ula Mos (c) | Missing | I | East Coast Comic Con Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 250 | Elias Chatzoudis | Missing |
